title: North America "Unavailable"
body: I understand the issue with people being stuck in login queue but my client has the "Launch" button grey'd out. Can't even click it. Is this the same issue or a different one?

replies.body:
This issue was related to the one with people being stuck in the login queue. The login service was brought back up and the issue was resolved after our team of hextechnicians led by Heimerdinger, were able to fix it right up!

Let me know if you still have issues logging in.
There updating the game atm from the errors and stuff. The game will be up soon hopefully.
Hah, beat you to it. Now its an unofficial race that I wont participate in.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/WjEsN1tZ-riot-compensation-for-downed-server Already multiple threads on this. Join the Mega thread.
